slides.text:
Qualitative Research and Synthesis

From ethnographic research methods - contextual inquires, interviews, observing behaviors, cultural probes, etc., create user profiles and goals. Framing user experience for the product.

Site Map and Page Flow

Analyze feasible data structure and information architecture. Organize and arrange by user goals and behaviors. Investigate how to translate complex data into comprehensive products.

Wire frames and Prototypes in Various Fidelities

Create wire frames and prototypes based on user scenarios. Usability tests.

Quantitative Research and Web Analytics

Find patterns and use cases from analytics data. Generate visualizations to communicate status and observe release impacts. Work in Omniture, Google Analytics and Quantcast.
